Articles.Content:
First of all, I'd like to say this is not my idea, but instead it is my friend's, who doesn't have KSP forum account.

Seeing as Career mode will soon be having money and finances, I thought about how you would get money. That's when my friend brought up the idea of taking "requests" form Kerbals.

For example: someone might ask you to launch a certain probe in orbit around Kerbin. So, you get the probe on orbit, and the requester gives you the money.

And that's about it. It's simple, sure, but I feel it will encourage players to not only learn how to get things into space, but to do them more effectively by upgrading parts in the tech tree.
I might be wrong, but I think functionality like that is already planned through Contracts.
